# insertingTiledIntermediate()

**Instance Method**

Create an image that inserts a intermediate that is cached in tiles

## Declaration

```swift
func insertingTiledIntermediate() -> CIImage
```

## Return Value

 An autoreleased [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage].

## Discussion

This intermediate will be cacheable even if [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContextOption/cacheIntermediates] is false.
